name: Grilled Cheese Shooters
author: Sahara B
summary: My favorite fall/winter cold weather snack. Great with the family or friends over to watch the game or enjoy that book club review. Easy and quick fix that will always please. Forgive me for saying... Who doesn't love a great grilled cheese sandwich topped with tomato soup? Garnish with a dollop of our cream and chive sprigs.
ingredients: 2 (18.75 ounce) cans tomato bisque (such as Campbell's®)
directions: Pour 1 can tomato bisque into a microwave-safe bowl
Cover and cook in the microwave until hot, 2 1/2 to 3 minutes
Butter 1 side of each slice of bread
Place 2 slices of Cheddar cheese on the unbuttered sides of 2 slices
Top with the other 2 slices, buttered-side up, to make the sandwiches
Heat a large skillet over medium-high heat
Heat until toasted and golden on 1 side, 2 to 3 minutes
Flip and toast the other side, about 2 minutes more
Slice sandwiches into 1 1/2-inch squares, 18 squares in total
Thread a toothpick through each square
Pour heated soup into heat-proof shot glasses and top with the grilled cheese squares
